headlines.description: — James Ward-Prowse unleashed a pair of stunning strikes as Southampton fought back from two goals down to claim a 2-2 draw in the Premier League against midtable rival Brighton on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ward-Prowse double as Southampton draws 2-2 at Brighton

headlines.description: Burnley climbed out of the Premier League relegation zone as they beat Wolverhampton Wanderers 1-0 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley moved out of bottom three with win over Wolves

headlines.description: Christian Pulisic scored a dramatic late winner to give Chelsea a much-needed 1-0 win against 10-man West Ham United at Stamford Bridge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic's late winner earns Chelsea vital victory

headlines.description: Liverpool produced a battling display in the Merseyside derby against Everton to earn a 2-0 win at Anfield on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool battle past Everton to keep pace at top
